body:
Another (small but important for me) benefit.
Methods inside these grouped declaration can be sorted alphabetically (using some cmd tool) because they are `isolated` and sorted order will get only better perception of a such parts of the source code.
I don't propose this (some cmd tool for sorting) but this used in OOP languages because order of methods does not changes perception of the functionality.

Sort of the global declarations of the methods are possible but harder because it can break some ideas which incorporated into a some file of the source code.
